TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_India, title = India, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/India} }

S.FORM: India hya' ga cyux maki' tay 20 00 N, 77 00 E na Aziya' syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 3,287,263 sq km (maki' tay 7ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 2,973,193 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 314,070 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 1,266,883,598. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 60.50% , lhlahuy hya' ga 23.10%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 16.40%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga New Delhi. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 26 na tay qutux byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Pranab Mukherjee, aring ryax 25 squ byacing tay 7 sa kawas 2012 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

India hya' ga cyox maki' tay 20 00 N, 77 00 E na Aziya' syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 3,287,263 sq km (maki' tay 7ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 2,973,193 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 314,070 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 1,266,883,598. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 60.50% , lhlahoy hya' ga 23.10%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 16.40%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga New Delhi. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 26 na tay qotox byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Pranab Mokherjee, aring ryax 25 sqo byacing tay 7 sa kawas 2012 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
